sentences.sContent: The tree was probably a hundred years old.
sentences.sCn: 这棵树很可能已经有100年了。

sentences.sContent: They’ve had this argument a hundred times before.
sentences.sCn: 这个问题他们以前已经争论过无数次了。

sentences.sContent: ...I would like to sell it for two hundred Yuan...
...The land has been independent for over three hundred years...
...to save another hundred dollars or so...
...The sword hasn't had a military function for a hundred years...
...This is necessary because full-time students probably have to read several hundred pages every week...
...There were more than a hundred people at Kate's birthday party...
...It lets people get about five hundred channels...
...and there were several hundred more acres with construction under way...

phrases.pCn: 五百分（牌戏，一种以得500分为胜局的游戏）
n. [史]百日王朝（拿破仑一世第二次统治法国时期的称谓，从1815年3月20日至6月28日）
一百与一之比；可能性极大

words.tran: 第一百的；一百分之一的
第一百，第一百个；百分之一

trans.tranOther: a very large number of things or people
